message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe is worth a significant amount to the right buyer.  While I can't divulge specifics at this time, I can tell you that I've already received another offer for $1500000.  I'm confident that this product holds even greater value for you.  I'm willing to offer it to you for $1750000. This is a one-time opportunity, and I believe it will be a valuable investment for you. Please let me know your decision.
